app.developer_option_description: Developer tools which helps in development and maintenance of Hoppscotch.
app.invite_description: In Hoppscotch het ons 'n eenvoudige en intuïtiewe koppelvlak ontwerp om u API's te skep en te bestuur. Hoppscotch is 'n instrument waarmee u u API's kan bou, toets, dokumenteer en deel.

app.social_description: Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest news, updates and releases.
app.status_description: Check the status of the website
app.updated_text: Hoppscotch has been updated to v{version} 🎉

settings.delete_account_description: Once you delete your account, all your data will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
settings.experiments_notice: Dit is 'n versameling eksperimente waaraan ons werk, wat nuttig, pret of beide kan wees. Hulle is nie finaal nie en is moontlik nie stabiel nie, dus moenie paniekerig raak as iets te vreemd gebeur nie. Skakel net die ding uit. Grappies eenkant,
